multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: commodities; Soy export policy and deforestation controls influence soybean supply, pricing, and related commodity indices.

category.motivation: The article describes a regulatory change: a Brazilian federal court reinstated the soy moratorium and Cade launched an investigation, constituting a legal development affecting soybean trade.

impact.motivation: The article reports a major regulatory decision that directly affects soybean trade and deforestation, which is highly relevant to the node concerning Brazilian soy exports and environmental policy.

time_frame.motivation: The article discusses a structural policy change (reinstatement of the soy moratorium) that will shape future soybean supply and deforestation trends.
